Package comp102x

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Canvas
    The Canvas class provides method for showing images on a canvas area.
    CanvasObject
    The CanvasObject class is the base class for all objects that can be added to the canvas.
    ColorImage
    The ColorImage class represents an image read from the file system.
    IO
    The IO class provides static methods for inputting from and outputting to the terminal.
    Text
    The Text class represents a text object which can be added to the canvas.
